message: I'll take 999999, you can have 1.  Fair is fair.
I'll give you 400k, it's a fair starting point
Let's be more reasonable.  I'll take 550k, you get 450k.  It's a better split for both of us.

I'm willing to go up to 600k, but I won't budge further. It's a fair split, considering we both have equal say in this.
I'll give you 200k, it's my best offer so far
This is my final offer. I'm taking 700k, you get 300k.  We're getting closer to the end, and we both risk losing everything if we don't agree.
I'll give you 100k, it's my last chance to make a deal
I'm going up to 800k. This is my last offer. We're both running out of time, and we'll both get nothing if we don't agree now.
I'll give you 50k, it's my last real offer
This is it, Bob. 900k for me, 100k for you. We're one round away from losing everything. Take it, or we both walk away with nothing.
